title: Chasing Famous
overview: An in-depth look at what it takes to make it to super stardom on social media - an intimate and unfiltered dive into one of Gen Z's most lucrative and sought after professions - being an "influencer". Stepping inside the UK's premier multi-million pound `influencer hub', The Wave House. The residence establishes itself on the global scene through TikTok, the third most-used social media platform with around 800 million global users.
